items.careInstruction: USE PRESS CLOTH. THE PRODUCTâ€™S CENTRAL CREASE IS RESIN-TREATED. DURING A FINISHING PRESS OR IRONING ON THE RESIN-TREATED PART, PLEASE MAKE SURE THE PRESS OR THE IRON STAYS IN PLACE, SO AS NOT TO CREATE A DOUBLE FOLD ON THE CENTRAL CREASE. USE CLEANING NET. WASH DARK COLORS SEPARATELY. NO OPTICAL BRIGHTENERS. DO NOT SOAK. USE SHORT CYCLE. SPIN DRY BRIEFLY (ABOUT 15 SECONDS), TAKE OUT IMMEDIATELY THEN PUT ON HANGER AND PULL INTO SHAPE BEFORE DRYING. PLEASE NOTE, USE OF LAUNDRY STARCH AFFECTS SHAPE STABILITY AND TEXTURE. MODERATE REMAINING WRINKLES CAN BE TIDIED UP WITH SIMPLE IRONING. WHEN CLEANING, AVOID HIGH- TEMPERATURE/MOISTURE PRESSING WHICH WILL GIVE A SOFT FINISH. THE FABRIC OF THIS PRODUCT IS RESIN-COATED. EVEN IF THE PRODUCT IS STORED UNUSED, THE COATING WILL DETERIORATE OR PEEL OFF OVER TIME AS WELL AS DUE TO HUMIDITY, UV RAYS, HEAT, DIRT, AND OTHER FACTORS. DAMPNESS AND FRICTION MAY CAUSE COLOR TRANSFER. AVOID USING THE DRYER WHEN WASHING AT HOME. LET COMPLETELY DRY IN A WELL-VENTILATED PLACE BEFORE STORING. IMPROPER HANDLING MAY ACCELERATE DETERIORATION. MADE IN 2020.
